courseDescription:
By taking this course, you will learn to deliver high-quality presentations following a simple process: selecting a topic, developing content and delivering it in style. We first introduce you to the ‘3 Es’ (eagerness, eligibility and experience) of choosing a topic before acquiring the skills to develop all the parts of presentation content. Here, we will explore proven tools like brainstorming, mind-mapping and other 'pearls of wisdom' that help to simplify the content-creation process.

Next, you will discover typography and the colour wheel and understand how to incorporate these into your slides to make them more engaging. You will investigate the different variations of slides to find the best one to use for maximum effectiveness. Following this, you will see how to structure your presentation's opening, incorporating body language, voice modulation, eye contact and stage movements to make your language, voice modulation, eye contact and gestures stand out.

This course's content is highly engaging, with stunning graphics and animations frequently used to enhance your knowledge and overall experience. It also contains passionately delivered information and presentational expertise gathered over the lifetime of a true professional. The techniques introduced here are still being used today to great success by the presenter in corporate events and educational and government organisations. So why are you waiting? Enrol today and learn how to deliver outstanding presentations.
